entry.name: AstraMilitarum/SteelLegionnaire
entry.value: Steel Legionnaire

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/SteelLegionnaireDescription
entry.value: Light infantry units specialising in close-quarters deployments from transports and in fighting Orks.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/SteelLegionnaireFlavor
entry.value: Steel Legionnaires, hailing from Armageddon, are masters of mechanised warfare. Their doctrine revolves around rapid deployments from APCs, namely Chimeras, to disrupt enemy forces before they can muster a defence. Steel Legionnaires wield Voss Pattern Lasguns, which sacrifice range for a smaller profile that leaves more space in a troop transport. Due to their experience in the Third War for Armageddon, Steel Legionnaires are experts at fighting Orks.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/SteelLegionStormTrooper
entry.value: Steel Legion Storm Trooper

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/SteelLegionStormTrooperDescription
entry.value: Elite shock infantry unit specialising in close-quarters deployments from transports and in fighting Orks. Has less armour than Tempestus Scions.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/SteelLegionStormTrooperFlavor
entry.value: Steel Legion Storm Troopers are the Legion's finest soldiers, forged in the Wars for Armageddon. They carry Hellguns and have Carapace Armour underneath their iconic greatcoats. While protective, they aren't as heavily armoured as their counterparts from the Schola Progenium.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ArmageddonOrkHunters
entry.value: Armageddon Ork Hunters

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ArmageddonOrkHuntersDescription
entry.value: Close-range infantry trained to fight in forests and defeat Orks. Can plant anti-infantry traps. Has Ork-like traits.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ArmageddonOrkHuntersFlavor
entry.value: On Armageddon, the strongest survivors from destroyed units are formed into the Armageddon Ork Hunters. They are thrust into dense jungles, where they constantly battle Orks in a futile attempt to quell the tide. Not for a lack of effort, though. They live and breathe warfare and extermination. In fact, they are so accustomed to slaughtering Orks, they have become not so different from the very foe they face.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/SteelLegionPurgationSquad
entry.value: Steel Legion Purgation Squad

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/SteelLegionPurgationSquadDescription
entry.value: Small infantry units armed with flamers that can clear Orkoid Fungus and Forests.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/SteelLegionPurgationSquadFlavor
entry.value: Clearing an area of Orks is a long, uphill battle, making it all the more important to make sure they can't return. Armageddon has enough Ork-controlled territory; Purgation Squads ensure Imperial lands and cleansed of filthy Xeno spawners.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/OrkHuntersTrap
entry.value: Punji Trap

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/OrkHuntersTrapDescription
entry.value: Slows and damages enemy infantry.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/OrkHuntersTrapFlavor
entry.value: Armageddon Ork Hunters deftly lay pitfall traps to halt any would-be attackers. Da Boyz aren't so tough with broken legs and half of them impaled.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ArmageddonChimera
entry.value: Armageddon Pattern Chimera

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ArmageddonChimeraDescription
entry.value: Tougher, more expensive Chimera that can easily slip behind enemy lines. Its smoke launcher is improved and can target beyond the vehicle itself.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/APDS6aDefender
entry.value: APDS-6a Defender

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/APDS6aDefenderDescription
entry.value: Improvised tank with a Laser Demolisher, specialising in cutting through tanks.
